body.name: Qaestfy Baseboard Cleaner Tool with Handle, Wall Floor Mop with Extendable Long Handle Duster for Cleaning Window, Floor, Skirting Board, Ceiling, Shower, Tub Tile, Kitchen with 6 Reusable Pads

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 43 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Baseboard Cleaner Tool】60"/152cm long handle with unique shape follows the baseboard's contour. Protection for the back up to a 60" handle. Stooping to clean baseboard, mouldings, ceiling, windows, bathtubs, and floors won't be necessary any longer.

【Wall Ceiling Cleaner Mop with Long Handle】Use any microfiber mop to remove stains without harming surfaces. Excellent for cleaning painted walls, washable wallpaper, baseboards, woodwork, doors, wall coverings, and baseboards.

【Floor Dust Sweeper Mop】Use any microfiber mop to keep your floors dust-free and spotless. Or clean windows before dusting them. Safe on any floor types, similar to windows, vinyl, laminate, hardwood, and tile floors.
【All-purpose Dry and Wet Mop】Each microfiber pad can be used in dry and wet conditions to dust walls, baseboard, floors, windows, tub and tile, safe to clean all types of floors and walls.

【Come with 6 Microfiber Pads】We’re cutting the majority of emissions through reducing in packing materials, and low-carbon shipping. So that we can provide more cleaning mop pads instead. Carbon neutral is the common aim. Because the earth won’t wait. Neither will we.
【Replaceable and Machine-washable】Mop pads are available. The microfiber replacement head model is designated QAE014; The blue microfiber mop pad will be availalble soon.
【Squeegee with Long Handle for Windows】A thick rubber blade won't leave smudges and won't scratch your tiles or windows.

A positive shopping experience and lifetime services support are provided. Guaranteed for 365 days following the date of purchase. Christmas presents of cleaning supplies for family or friends can be given in a sturdy, elegant gift package, especially for elderly people.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Floor Baseboard Cleaner Tool with Handle Wall Cleaning Mop with Long Handle Great for cleaning baseboard, walls, ceiling, window, floor, tub and tile
Baseboard Cleaning Tool Contour lever for most baseboards Floor Sweeping Mop Microfiber mop effectively pick up dust and dirt

Floor Cleaning Mop with Long Handle 60'' / 152cm ergonomic long handle makes cleaning floor a breeze. No more bending over. Pick up dust in a second. Clean Floor Easy to Clean Floor Base Boards Save your back and knees . No more kneel down with a microfiber towel or baseboard duster. Just Stand out, Wipe and Go! Baseboard Wall Mop with Long Handle 60'' / 152cm long handle wall cleaning tool. With this set reach all your walls without ladders and ceiling. Especially great for seniors to do household cleaning. Painted Wall Ceiling Cleaner Tool 60'' / 152cm for most indoors. Won't strain your back when cleaning ceiling and walls. No more ladders! High Ceiling Window Washing Kit with Extension Pole Comes with 6 microfiber pads. Each pad can be used to clean indoors and outdoors window, walls. Windows Shower Mop with Long Handle With these microfiber mop, you can use to clean your bathtub as well. It won't scratch your tub surface, like porcelain tub etc Tub & Tile

Sturdy Long Handle Adjustable pole, up to 60'' / 152cm Pack of 6 Microfiber Pads Comes with 2 different types of replacement mop pads. Machine Washable Head Put in a washer. The reusable cleaning pads are easy to clean in the washing machine Extra Refill Available Check Model QAE014, QAE015 for more replacement pads if needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: This baseboard and wall cleaner works very good. The design is well thought out. The metal extension wand is very sturdy and the cleaning pad fits against the baseboard good. The microfiber pads fit strongly on the pad and good a great job of removing dust (and/or pet hair!). If you don’t like bending down to clean baseboards I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Great product for keeping baseboard clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a great household item.
reviews.reviewText: I used it and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Between my husband who comes home from work covered in oil and our dog, I’ve been looking for something that will do the trick. Definitely recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Amazon buy in over a year!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, long pole is amazingly sturdy. Cleans tgg hot e baseboards remarkably well and the cleaning pad! Well made throw in the washer and you are donr! .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. It is so much easier to clean the baseboards now and the two types of covers for baseboards and walls makes it even more useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as expected.
reviews.reviewText: Unable to use as expected. Returned. Charged shipping to return 🤨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that this was easy to assemble. This makes it easier to clean the hard-to-reach spots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is fab, I use it for walls, and my kitchen cupboard doors as well as skirting boards and it makes such short work of very tedious tasks. Best gadget I’ve bought in years.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not suitable for smaller skirts, cannot be adjusted
reviews.reviewText: Unable to use as it is not adjustable to our skirting boards, waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good skirting board cleaner; easy to assemble and I love that it comes with so many washable microfibre cloths (3x two different types). I am not particularly tall, but the long handle makes it easy to dust hard to reach places, such as the top of shelves.It's unbelivably quick to do a once around and clean the skirting boards, though I still need to perfect my technique as my boards are very uneven and it sometimes slips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy mop, fits together easily, and it's great having lots of cleaning pads, don't have to wait for them washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for cleaning the tiles in my bathroom
